author: Reuters Editorial
title: Osisko Metals Signs Option Agreement With Osisko Mining On Urban-Barry Base Metal Exploration Claim Group
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Osisko Metals Inc:
* OSISKO METALS SIGNS OPTION AGREEMENT WITH OSISKO MINING ON URBAN-BARRY BASE METAL EXPLORATION CLAIM GROUP
* OSISKO METALS INC - ‍SIGNED AN OPTION AGREEMENT WITH OSISKO MINING INC TO EARN A 50% INTEREST IN URBAN-BARRY BASE METALS PROJECT​
* OSISKO METALS INC - ‍PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT, CO MAY EARN 50% INTEREST IN PROJECT BY FUNDING AGGREGATE OF $5 MILLION IN EXPLORATION EXPENDITURES OVER 4 YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
